norah.desc: Educational video game about Argentine female artists (Construct 3). Art, music, concept, and programming. Award for Best Sound.

habitar.desc: Original music for 4 mini-documentaries about architects from BsAs. Prod. by Estudio Fiørd.

memory.desc: Music and sound design for a short film in Unreal 5. Directed by Aldana Drisaldi.

goodbye.desc: Letter to the unborn. Short film by Sebastian Pérez Opačak. Official Selection.

retro.desc: Original music for a YouTube channel dedicated to retro gaming culture in Argentina.

cosmicVicar.description: Sound identity for independent artists. A space where analog and digital converge under the direction of Julián Barabino.

production.title: Music Production
production.description: From initial composition to final arrangements to bring your songs to life.

mixing.title: Mixing & Mastering
mixing.description: Professional balance, depth, and clarity so your music sounds amazing everywhere.

editing.title: Audio Editing
editing.description: Cleaning, tuning, and precise synchronization for a polished and flawless sound.

gameAudio.title: SFX & Game Audio
gameAudio.description: Immersive sound effect design and music that enhance the gaming experience.

soundDiary.title: Sound Diary
soundDiary.description: A personal archive of textures, raw demos, and b-sides.
